pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, June 1, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Halifax, Nova Scotia

9 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a keynote address at the Federation of Canadian Municipalitiesâ€™ 2018 Annual Conference.

Ballroom, Halifax Convention Centre
1650 Argyle Street

9:50 a.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities, Amarjeet Sohi, will meet with municipal leaders.

Room 615, Halifax Convention Centre
1650 Argyle Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage of keynote for accredited media
    • Photo opportunity for accredited media at beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:30 a.m.
    • For media accreditation, please contact media@fcm.ca

Media appearance

8:13 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Radio One (Nova Scotia), Information Morning.
